headline: Is Boston Scientific (BSX) Pricing Reflect Long Term Growth Expectations After Strong Multi Year Run
summary: If you are wondering whether Boston Scientific's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, you are not alone. This article focuses on what the numbers may say about value. The stock last closed at US$98.65, with returns of 3.5% over 7 days, 5.1% over 30 days, 4.2% year to date, 2.8% over 1 year, 115.3% over 3 years and 173.6% over 5 years, which many investors look at when weighing growth potential against risk.
